attributes.background: Legalise cannabis for recreational use in a licensed premises for adults over a certain age, People shouldn’t be criminalised for using a naturally grown plant to there benefit

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Legalise medical and recreational cannabis in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551846

Allow the British public to vote on the legalisation of cannabis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318654
